name: Galaxy Quest
summary:
Save your partner in Galaxy Quest, an intergalactic match-3 mission! During a routine research flight, your partner and his crew are sucked into a wormhole. With nothing more than his final distorted radio transmission to guide you, you set out to find them.

Unearthly dangers and challenges await you, but luckily, so do helpful extraterrestrials who are eager to help you on your journey. Together, you'll experience a unique adventure and a one-of-a-kind match-3 game.
